info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 3:49PM EDT until July 28 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Warren County in east central New York... Northeastern Saratoga County in east central New York... Central Washington County in east central New York... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 349 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Luzerne-Hadley, or 12 miles southwest of Lake George Village, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Lake George Village, Fort Edward, Corinth, Hartford, Comstock, West Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne Campground, Glens Falls North, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Mount Hope, South Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne, Hadley, Lake George, Fort Ann, Cleverdale and Beartown. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
